name: jides-cms-style-blog-site
description:

[QUESTIONS](#questions) --- ## DESCRIPTION CMS-Style-Blog-Site where developers(users) can publish blog posts and comment on other developers(users) posts as well.
App is deployed to Heroku.
App follows MVC paradigm in its architechural structure.
App uses handlebars as the templating language.
App uses Sequelize as the ORM.
App uses express-session npm package for authentication.
